strChoice.story: When your friend randomly starts crying
strChoice.choice2: Ask her if anything is wrong
strChoice.choice4: Tell her to stop crying and suck it up

strChoice.story: Your friend is ignoring your texts
strChoice.choice2: Ask him if anything is wrong

strChoice.story: Your friend is being sassy and you don't know why
strChoice.choice2: Ask her if anything is wrong
strChoice.choice4: Tell her she's a bad friend

strChoice.story: Your friend is complaining to you about the same thing over and over
strChoice.choice1: Say 'can you be quiet for even a sec??'
strChoice.choice3: Help her with the issue and give advice
strChoice.choice4: Roll your eyes and say 'this again?'

strChoice.story: Your friend wants to go to a restaurant you don't like much
strChoice.choice2: Tell her you don't like it and ask to go somewhere else
strChoice.choice3: Tell her you can go this time but you want to choose next time
strChoice.choice4: Tell her she has bad taste

strChoice.story: Your friend is being mean to your common friend
strChoice.choice2: Tell her to not be mean
